{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WPG54G |revision= |upc=745883556625 |ean=302542120346 |asin=B0001NA394 |newegg=N82E16815120001R |price=300 |serialnum_prefix=BER0 |est_release_date=03/24/2004 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=hardware PowerPoint machine, screen sharer, computer screen streamer |fcc_id=Q87-WPG54G,PKWWPG12,PKW-WPG11 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Intel |cpu1_model= |fla1=32 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model=CF card |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model= |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=USB 1.1, VGA, |expansion_vga_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand= |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=IR remote, VGA out, |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=WPG54G-linksys |default_ssid_regex=^WPG54G-linksys$ |default_ip=192.168.1.200 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui=00:0F:66,00:12:17 |oui_eth=00:0F:66,00:12:17 }} {{TagLine|Wireless-G Presentation Player}} :[http://support.linksys.com/en-mea/support/video/WPG54G Product page] {{•}} [https://www.linksys.com/us/support-product?pid=01t80000003KZQ4AAO Support page]
WPG54G serial numbers appear to start with '''BER0'''. :Invalid FCC ID… ([https://i.ebayimg.com/images/g/xjMAAOSwqvNadkOw/s-l1600.jpg label])
===Overview=== *Give your presentations wirelessly-bridges wireless :(or wired) PCs and projectors *Allows impromptu projector-control switching between :clients for interactive meetings *Application independent, use it with all favorite programs *Upload PowerPoint slides to 32MB internal flash or :your USB memory disk for PC-less presentations *Includes infrared remote control with laser pointer
===Reviews=== *[http://www.wi-fiplanet.com/reviews/article.php/3344891/Linksys-Wireless-G-Presentation-Player.htm ''Linksys WPG54G'' on '''Wi-Fi Planet'''] :VGA: 1024x768/800x600 (24fps) *[http://www.wi-fiplanet.com/reviews/article.php/2243871/Linksys-Presentation-Player.htm ''Linksys WPG12'' on '''Wi-Fi Planet''']
===See also=== *[[Linksys WMA11B]] - ''Digital HD Media Streamer'' *[[Linksys WMB54G]] - ''Wireless-G Music Bridge'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/Q87-WMB54G Q87-WMB54G] (2005-11-30) *[[Linksys WPG54G]] - ''Wireless-G Presentation Player'' *[[Linksys WPG11]] - ''Wireless-B Presentation Player'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/PKW-WPG11 PKW-WPG11] ([[Gemtek WL-350F]]) :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MXF-PS910815 MXF-PS910815] ([[Gemtek]]) STPC :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/Q87-WM54G-I Q87-WM54G-I] ([[Linksys]]) *[[Linksys WPG12]] - ''Wireless-B Presentation Player'' :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/PKWWPG12 PKWWPG12] (2002-10-17)
